sourcesContent:
<template>
  <a-layout>
    <a-layout-content style="padding: 24px">
      <a-card title="新用户注册" :bordered="false">
        <a-form :form="form" @submit="handleSubmit" layout="vertical">
          <a-form-item
            label="新用户名"
            :labelCol="{ span: 24 }"
            :wrapperCol="{ span: 24 }"
            hasFeedback
          >
            <a-input
              v-decorator="[
                'username',
                { rules: [{ required: true, message: '请输入新用户名!' }] },
              ]"
            />
          </a-form-item>
          <a-form-item
            label="密码"
            :labelCol="{ span: 24 }"
            :wrapperCol="{ span: 24 }"
            hasFeedback
          >
            <a-input-password
              v-decorator="[
                'password',
                { rules: [{ required: true, message: '请输入密码!' }] },
              ]"
            />
          </a-form-item>
          <a-form-item
            label="确认密码"
            :labelCol="{ span: 24 }"
            :wrapperCol="{ span: 24 }"
            hasFeedback
          >
            <a-input-password
              v-decorator="[
                'confirm',
                {
                  rules: [
                    { required: true, message: '请确认密码!' },
                    ({ getFieldValue }) => ({
                      validator(_, value) {
                        if (!value || getFieldValue('password') === value) {
                          return Promise.resolve();
                        }
                        return Promise.reject(
                          new Error('两次输入的密码不匹配!')
                        );
                      },
                    }),
                  ],
                },
              ]"
            />
          </a-form-item>
          <a-form-item
            label="员工密钥（可选）"
            :labelCol="{ span: 24 }"
            :wrapperCol="{ span: 24 }"
          >
            <a-input
              v-decorator="['employeeKey', { rules: [{ required: false }] }]"
            />
          </a-form-item>
          <a-form-item
            label="手机号（可选）"
            :labelCol="{ span: 24 }"
            :wrapperCol="{ span: 24 }"
          >
            <a-input
              v-decorator="[
                'phone',
                {
                  rules: [
                    {
                      required: false,
                      pattern: /^1[3-9]\d{9}$/,
                      message: '请输入正确的手机号!',
                    },
                  ],
                },
              ]"
            />
          </a-form-item>
          <a-form-item :wrapperCol="{ span: 24, offset: 0 }">
            <a-button type="primary" htmlType="submit">提交注册</a-button>
            <a-button style="margin-left: 8px" @click="handleCancel"
              >取消注册</a-button
            >
          </a-form-item>
        </a-form>
      </a-card>
    </a-layout-content>
  </a-layout>
</template>

<script>
import { Form, Input, Button, Card, Layout } from "ant-design-vue";
const { FormItem } = Form;
const { Content } = Layout;

export default {
  components: {
    "a-form": Form,
    "a-input": Input,
    "a-button": Button,
    "a-card": Card,
    "a-layout": Layout,
    "a-layout-content": Content,
    "a-form-item": FormItem,
    "a-input-password": Input.Password,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      form: this.$form.createForm(this),
    };
  },
  methods: {
    handleSubmit(e) {
      e.preventDefault();
      this.form.validateFields((err, values) => {
        if (!err) {
          console.log("Received values of form: ", values);
          // 这里可以添加提交表单的逻辑
        }
      });
    },
    handleCancel() {
      // 这里可以添加取消注册的逻辑
      this.form.resetFields();
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
/* 你可以在这里添加一些自定义的样式 */
</style>
